meanings.definition: A person or thing that moves quickly.
meanings.sent1: The speedsters raced down the track with lightning speed.
meanings.sent2: The cheetahs are known as the speedsters of the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The speedsters in the race were so fast, they almost looked like a blur.
meanings.sent4: The hummingbird is a tiny speedster, darting from flower to flower.
meanings.sent5: The speedsters in the marathon left everyone else far behind.

meanings.sent1: The sleek sports car was a true speedster on the highway.
meanings.sent2: The speedsters on the track sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent3: The speedster of a car zoomed past the traffic effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: The speedster athlete broke the world record in the 100-meter dash.
meanings.sent5: The speedster motorcycle roared down the road, leaving a trail of dust behind.
